translations.literal: Gengxu day: Minister of Works Liu Kai became Minister of the Masses, Grand Master of the Palace Yuan Chang became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day, Liu Kai, Minister of Works, became Minister of the Masses, and Yuan Chang, Grand Master of the Palace, became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 三年春正月甲戌，修理太原舊溝渠，溉灌官私田。

translations.literal: Third year, spring, first month, Jiaxu day: Repaired Taiyuan old ditches and canals, irrigated official and private fields.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiaxu day of the first month of spring in the third year, Taiyuan's old ditches and canals were repaired to irrigate official and private fields.

sentences.zh: 東平陸上言木連理。

translations.literal: Dongping Lu reported trees grown together.
translations.idiomatic: Dongping Lu reported that trees had grown together.

sentences.zh: 蒼、鬱林、合浦蠻夷反叛，二月，遣侍御史任逴督州、郡兵討之。

translations.literal: Cang, Yulin, Hepu barbarian Yi rebelled, second month, dispatched Palace Attendant Censor Ren Tuo to supervise provincial and commandery troops to attack them.
translations.idiomatic: The barbarian Yi of Cang, Yulin, and Hepu rebelled; in the second month, Palace Attendant Censor Ren Tuo was dispatched to supervise provincial and commandery troops to attack them.

sentences.zh: 郡國十地震。

translations.literal: Commanderies and kingdoms ten earthquakes.
translations.idiomatic: There were ten earthquakes in the commanderies and kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 三月辛亥，日有食之。

translations.literal: Third month, Xinhai day: There was an eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day of the third month, there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 丙辰，赦蒼梧、鬱林、合浦、南海吏人為賊所迫者。

translations.literal: Bingchen day: Pardoned Cangwu, Yulin, Hepu, Nanhai officials and people who were coerced by bandits.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day, officials and people of Cangwu, Yulin, Hepu, and Nanhai who had been coerced by bandits were pardoned.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，京師旱。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Capital drought.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, there was drought in the capital.

sentences.zh: 五月，武陵蠻復叛，州、郡討破之。

translations.literal: Fifth month: Wuling barbarians again rebelled, province and commandery attacked and defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, the Wuling barbarians rebelled again; the province and commandery attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 癸酉，度遼將軍鄧遵率南匈奴擊先零羌於靈州，破之。

translations.literal: Guiyou day: Liao-crossing General Deng Zun led Southern Xiongnu to attack Xianling Qiang at Lingzhou, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guiyou day, Liao-crossing General Deng Zun led the Southern Xiongnu to attack the Xianling Qiang at Lingzhou and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 越巂徼外夷舉種內屬。

translations.literal: Yuesui frontier Yi submitted their tribes internally.
translations.idiomatic: The Yi beyond the frontiers of Yuesui submitted their tribes to Han rule.

sentences.zh: 六月，中郎將任尚遣兵擊破先零羌於丁奚城。

translations.literal: Sixth month: Colonel Protector Ren Shang dispatched troops to attack and defeat Xianling Qiang at Dingxi city.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, Colonel Protector Ren Shang dispatched troops to attack and defeat the Xianling Qiang at Dingxi city.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，武陵蠻復叛，州、郡討平之。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: Wuling barbarians again rebelled, province and commandery attacked and pacified them.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, the Wuling barbarians rebelled again; the province and commandery attacked and pacified them.

sentences.zh: 緱氏地坼。

translations.literal: Goushi ground split.
translations.idiomatic: The ground split in Goushi.

sentences.zh: 九月辛己，趙王宏薨。

translations.literal: Ninth month, Xinji day: King Hong of Zhao passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinji day of the ninth month, King Hong of Zhao passed away.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月，蒼梧、鬱林、合浦蠻夷降。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month: Cangwu, Yulin, Hepu barbarian Yi surrendered.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month of winter, the barbarian Yi of Cangwu, Yulin, and Hepu surrendered.

sentences.zh: 丙戌，初聽大臣、二千石、刺史行三年喪。

translations.literal: Bingxu day: Initially permitted ministers, two thousand shi, governors to observe three-year mourning.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingxu day, ministers, two thousand shi officials, and governors were initially permitted to observe three-year mourning.

sentences.zh: 癸卯，郡國九地震。

translations.literal: Guimao day: Commanderies and kingdoms nine earthquakes.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guimao day, there were nine earthquakes in the commanderies and kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 十二月丁巳，任尚遣兵擊破先零羌於北地。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, Dingsi day: Ren Shang dispatched troops to attack and defeat Xianling Qiang at Beidi.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day of the twelfth month, Ren Shang dispatched troops to attack and defeat the Xianling Qiang at Beidi.

sentences.zh: 四年春二月乙巳朔，日有食之。

translations.literal: Fourth year, spring, second month, Yisi first day: There was an eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: On the first day of the second month of spring in the fourth year, there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 乙卯，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Yimao day: Great amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yimao day, a general amnesty was granted throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 壬戌，武庫灾。

translations.literal: Renxu day: Armory disaster.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renxu day, there was a disaster at the armory.

sentences.zh: 夏四月戊申，司空袁敞薨。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Wushen day: Minister of Works Yuan Chang passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wushen day of the fourth month of summer, Minister of Works Yuan Chang passed away.

sentences.zh: 己巳，鮮卑寇遼西，遼西郡兵與烏桓擊破之。

translations.literal: Jisi day: Xianbei invaded Liaoxi, Liaoxi commandery troops together with Wuhuan attacked and defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day, the Xianbei invaded Liaoxi; Liaoxi commandery troops together with the Wuhuan attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 五月丁丑，太常李郃為司空。

translations.literal: Fifth month, Dingchou day: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Li He became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day of the fifth month, Li He, Grand Minister of Ceremonies, became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 六月戊辰，三郡雨雹。

translations.literal: Sixth month, Wuchen day: Three commanderies rain and hail.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuchen day of the sixth month, three commanderies suffered rain and hail.

sentences.zh: 京師及郡國十雨水。

translations.literal: Capital and commanderies kingdoms ten flooding.
translations.idiomatic: There was flooding in ten commanderies and kingdoms, including the capital.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：『今年秋稼茂好，垂可收獲，而連雨未霽，懼必淹傷。

translations.literal: Imperial edict said: 'This year autumn crops lush and good, nearly harvestable, yet continuous rain not cleared, fear must drown and harm.
translations.idiomatic: An imperial edict stated: 'This year's autumn crops are lush and good, nearly ready for harvest, yet the continuous rain has not cleared; I fear they must be drowned and harmed.

sentences.zh: 夕惕惟憂，思念厥咎。

translations.literal: Evening vigilant and anxious, think of their faults.
translations.idiomatic: Evening vigilant and anxious, I think of their faults.

sentences.zh: 夫霖雨者，人怨之所致。

translations.literal: Indeed continuous rain, human resentment's cause.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed, continuous rain is caused by human resentment.

sentences.zh: 其武吏以威暴下，文吏妄行苛刻，鄉吏因公生姦，為百姓所患苦者，有司顯明其罰。

translations.literal: Those military officials with power tyrannize subordinates, civil officials arbitrarily act harshly, village officials through public affairs produce corruption, those who cause suffering to the common people, the authorities make clear their punishments.
translations.idiomatic: Military officials who tyrannize their subordinates with power, civil officials who arbitrarily act harshly, village officials who produce corruption through public affairs—those who cause suffering to the common people shall have their punishments made clear by the authorities.

sentences.zh: 又《月令》「仲秋養衰老，授几杖，行糜粥」。

translations.literal: Moreover the Monthly Ordinances 'middle autumn nourish the aged, grant armrests and staffs, distribute millet gruel.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, as the Monthly Ordinances say: 'In middle autumn, nourish the aged; grant armrests and staffs; distribute millet gruel.'

sentences.zh: 方今案比之時，郡、縣多不奉行。

translations.literal: Just now at the time of examining comparisons, commanderies and counties mostly do not carry out.
translations.idiomatic: Just now, at the time of examining comparisons, most commanderies and counties do not carry it out.

sentences.zh: 雖有糜粥，糠秕相半，長吏怠事，莫有躬親，甚違詔書養老之意。

translations.literal: Although there are millet gruels, bran and husks half and half, senior officials indolent in affairs, none personally attend, greatly violate the edict's intent to care for the aged.
translations.idiomatic: Although there are millet gruels, they are half bran and husks; senior officials are indolent in their affairs and none personally attend; this greatly violates the edict's intent to care for the aged.

sentences.zh: 其務崇仁恕，賑護寡獨，稱朕意焉。』

translations.literal: Let them diligently promote benevolence and mercy, relieve and protect the widowed and orphaned, accord with my intentions.''
translations.idiomatic: Let them diligently promote benevolence and mercy, relieve and protect the widowed and orphaned, according with my intentions.''

sentences.zh: 九月，護羌校尉任尚使客刺殺叛羌零昌。

translations.literal: Ninth month: Protector Qiang Colonel Ren Shang sent a guest assassin to kill rebel Qiang Lingchang.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, Protector Qiang Colonel Ren Shang sent an assassin to kill the rebel Qiang leader Lingchang.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月己卯，彭城王恭薨。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month, Jimao day: King Gong of Pengcheng passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jimao day of the eleventh month of winter, King Gong of Pengcheng passed away.

sentences.zh: 十二月，越巂夷寇遂久，殺縣令。

translations.literal: Twelfth month: Yuesui Yi invaded Suiqiu, killed the county magistrate.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, the Yuesui Yi invaded Suiqiu and killed the county magistrate.

sentences.zh: 甲子，任尚及騎都尉馬賢與先零羌戰於富平上河，大破之。

translations.literal: Jiazi day: Ren Shang and Cavalry Colonel Ma Xian battled with Xianling Qiang at Fuping Shanghe, greatly defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiazi day, Ren Shang and Cavalry Colonel Ma Xian battled with the Xianling Qiang at Fuping Shanghe and greatly defeated them.

sentences.zh: 虔人羌率眾降，隴右平。

translations.literal: Qianren Qiang led their multitude to surrender, Long right pacified.
translations.idiomatic: The Qianren Qiang led their multitude to surrender; Longxi province was pacified.

sentences.zh: 是歲，郡國十三地震。

translations.literal: This year, commanderies and kingdoms thirteen earthquakes.
translations.idiomatic: This year, there were thirteen earthquakes in the commanderies and kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 五年春正月，越巂夷叛。

translations.literal: Fifth year, spring, first month: Yuesui Yi rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the fifth year, the Yuesui Yi rebelled.

sentences.zh: 二月壬戌，中山王憲薨。

translations.literal: Second month, Renxu day: King Xian of Zhongshan passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renxu day of the second month, King Xian of Zhongshan passed away.

sentences.zh: 三月，京師及郡國五旱，詔稟遭旱貧人。

translations.literal: Third month: Capital and commanderies kingdoms five drought, imperial edict provided grain to drought-afflicted poor people.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, there was drought in five commanderies and kingdoms including the capital; by imperial edict, grain was provided to the drought-afflicted poor people.

sentences.zh: 夏六月，高句驪與穢貊寇玄菟。

translations.literal: Summer, sixth month: Goguryeo and Huimo invaded Xuanyu.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month of summer, Goguryeo and Huimo invaded Xuanyu.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，越巂蠻夷及旄牛豪叛，殺長吏。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: Yuesui barbarian Yi and Mao Niu leaders rebelled, killed senior officials.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, the Yuesui barbarian Yi and Mao Niu leaders rebelled, killing senior officials.

sentences.zh: 丙子，詔曰：『舊令制度，各有科品，欲令百姓務崇節約。

translations.literal: Bingzi day: Imperial edict said: 'Old commands and institutions, each have categories and grades, desire to make the common people diligently promote frugality.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingzi day, an imperial edict stated: 'Old commands and institutions each have their categories and grades; we desire to make the common people diligently promote frugality.

sentences.zh: 遭永初之際，人離荒戹，朝廷躬自菲薄，去絕奢飾，食不兼味，衣無二綵。

translations.literal: Encountered Yongchu period, people scattered desolate distressed, court personally frugal, eliminated extravagant ornaments, food not two flavors, clothing without double colors.
translations.idiomatic: Having encountered the Yongchu period when people were scattered and desolate, the court personally practiced frugality, eliminated extravagant ornaments, ate no more than one flavor, and wore no more than one color.

sentences.zh: 比年雖獲豐穰，尚乏儲積，而小人無慮，不圖久長，嫁聚送終，紛華靡麗，至有走卒奴婢被綺縠，著珠璣。

translations.literal: Recent years although obtained abundance, still lack stores, yet petty people without forethought, not plan for long term, marriages gatherings funerals, extravagant splendor, even foot soldiers male and female slaves wear silk gauze, adorn pearls and jades.
translations.idiomatic: Although recent years have yielded abundance, stores are still lacking; yet petty people have no forethought and do not plan for the long term—marriages, gatherings, and funerals are extravagant and splendid, even to the point where foot soldiers and slaves wear silk gauze and adorn themselves with pearls and jades.

sentences.zh: 京師尚若斯，何以示四遠？

translations.literal: Capital still like this, how to demonstrate to the four distant?
translations.idiomatic: If the capital is still like this, how can we demonstrate to the four distant regions?

sentences.zh: 設張法禁，懇惻分明，而有司惰任，訖不奉行。

translations.literal: Established and displayed legal prohibitions, earnest and clear, yet the officials indolent in duty, ultimately do not carry out.
translations.idiomatic: Legal prohibitions have been established and displayed, earnest and clear; yet the officials are indolent in their duties and ultimately do not carry them out.

sentences.zh: 秋節既立，鷙鳥將用，且復重申，以觀後效。』

translations.literal: Autumn season already established, fierce birds about to be used, moreover again reiterate, to observe future effects.''
translations.idiomatic: The autumn season has been established, fierce birds are about to be used; moreover we reiterate again, to observe the future effects.''

sentences.zh: 八月丙申朔，日有食之。

translations.literal: Eighth month, BingShen first day: There was an eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: On the first day of the eighth month (BingShen), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑寇代郡，殺長吏。

translations.literal: Xianbei invaded Dai commandery, killed senior officials.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei invaded Dai commandery and killed senior officials.

sentences.zh: 冬十月，鮮卑寇上谷。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month: Xianbei invaded Shanggu.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter, the Xianbei invaded Shanggu.

sentences.zh: 十二月丁巳，中郎將任尚有辠，弃市。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, Dingsi day: Colonel Protector Ren Shang had crimes, executed in the market.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day of the twelfth month, Colonel Protector Ren Shang had crimes and was executed in the market.

sentences.zh: 是歲，郡國十四地震。

translations.literal: This year, commanderies and kingdoms fourteen earthquakes.
translations.idiomatic: This year, there were fourteen earthquakes in the commanderies and kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 六年春二月乙巳，京師及郡國四十二地震，或坼裂，水泉湧出。

translations.literal: Sixth year, spring, second month, Yisi day: Capital and commanderies kingdoms forty-two earthquakes, some split open, water springs gushed out.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yisi day of the second month of spring in the sixth year, there were forty-two earthquakes in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms; some ground split open and water springs gushed out.

sentences.zh: 壬子，詔三府選掾屬高第，能惠利牧養者各五人，光祿勲與中郎將選孝廉郎寬博有謀、清白行高者五十人，出補令、長、丞、尉。

translations.literal: Renzi day: Imperial edict that the Three Bureaus select assistant officials high grade, able to benefit and nurture each five people, Grand Master of the Palace together with Colonel Protector select filial and incorruptible gentlemen broad-minded having strategy, pure and honest conduct high fifty people, go out to fill magistrates, chancellors, assistants, captains.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renzi day, by imperial edict, the Three Bureaus were ordered to select five high-grade assistant officials each who are able to benefit and nurture; the Grand Master of the Palace together with the Colonel Protector were to select fifty filial and incorruptible gentlemen who are broad-minded and strategic, pure and honest in conduct; they were to go out and fill positions as magistrates, chancellors, assistants, and captains.

sentences.zh: 乙卯，詔曰：『夫政，先京師，後諸夏。

translations.literal: Yimao day: Imperial edict said: 'Indeed governance, first the capital, then the various Xia.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yimao day, an imperial edict stated: 'Indeed, governance begins with the capital, then the various Xia regions.

sentences.zh: 《月令》仲春「養幼小，存諸孤」，季春「賜貧窮，賑乏絕，省婦使，表貞女」，所以順陽氣，崇生長也。

translations.literal: Monthly Ordinances middle spring 'nourish the young and small, preserve the various orphans', last spring 'grant to the poor, relieve the destitute, reduce women's labor, honor chaste women', thus to follow yang qi, promote growth.
translations.idiomatic: The Monthly Ordinances state that in middle spring 'nourish the young and small, preserve the various orphans', and in last spring 'grant to the poor, relieve the destitute, reduce women's labor, honor chaste women'—this is to follow the yang qi and promote growth.

sentences.zh: 其賜人尤貧困、孤弱、單獨穀，人三斛；

translations.literal: Moreover grant to people especially impoverished, orphaned and weak, solitary grain, each person three dou;
translations.idiomatic: moreover, grant grain to those who are especially impoverished, orphaned and weak, or solitary—three dou each;

sentences.zh: 貞婦有節義十斛，甄表門閭，旌顯厥行。』

translations.literal: chaste women having moral integrity ten dou, examine and honor gate towers, banner manifest their conduct.''
translations.idiomatic: chaste women with moral integrity receive ten dou; examine and honor their gate towers, banner and manifest their conduct.''

sentences.zh: 三月庚辰，始立六宗，祀於洛城西北。

translations.literal: Third month, Gengchen day: Initially established the Six Revered Ones, sacrificed to at Luocheng northwest.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day of the third month, the Six Revered Ones were initially established and sacrifices made to them at the northwest of Luocheng.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，會稽大疫，遣光祿大夫將太醫循行疾病，賜棺木，除田租、口賦。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Kuaiji great epidemic, dispatched Grand Master of the Palace leading chief physicians to tour and examine illnesses, grant coffins, exempted field taxes, head tallies.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, there was a great epidemic in Kuaiji; Grand Masters of the Palace were dispatched leading chief physicians to tour and examine the illnesses, coffins were granted, and field taxes and head tallies were exempted.

sentences.zh: 沛國，勃海大風，雨雹。

translations.literal: Peiguo, Bohai great wind, rain and hail.
translations.idiomatic: In Peiguo and Bohai there were great winds with rain and hail.

sentences.zh: 五月，京師旱。

translations.literal: Fifth month: Capital drought.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, there was drought in the capital.

sentences.zh: 六月丁丑，樂成王賓薨。

translations.literal: Sixth month, Dingchou day: King Bin of Lecheng passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingchou day of the sixth month, King Bin of Lecheng passed away.

sentences.zh: 丙戌，平原王得薨。

translations.literal: Bingxu day: King De of Pingyuan passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingxu day, King De of Pingyuan passed away.

sentences.zh: 是歲，永昌、益州蜀郡夷叛，與越巂夷殺長吏，燔城邑，益州刺史張喬討破降之。

translations.literal: This year, Yongchang, Yizhou Shuguo Yi rebelled, with Yuesui Yi killed senior officials, burned cities and towns, Yizhou Governor Zhang Qiao attacked defeated and surrendered them.
translations.idiomatic: This year, the Yi of Yongchang and the Yi of Shuguo in Yizhou rebelled; together with the Yuesui Yi they killed senior officials and burned cities and towns; Yizhou Governor Zhang Qiao attacked, defeated, and accepted their surrender.

sentences.zh: 永寧元年春正月甲辰，任城王安薨。

translations.literal: Yongning first year, spring, first month, Jiachen day: King An of Rencheng passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiachen day of the first month of spring in the first year of Yongning, King An of Rencheng passed away.

sentences.zh: 三月丁酉，濟北王壽薨。

translations.literal: Third month, Dingyou day: King Shou of Jibei passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingyou day of the third month, King Shou of Jibei passed away.

sentences.zh: 車師後王叛，殺部司馬。

translations.literal: Cheshi rear king rebelled, killed the division colonel.
translations.idiomatic: The rear king of Cheshi rebelled and killed the division colonel.

sentences.zh: 沈氐羌寇張掖。

translations.literal: Shen Di Qiang invaded Zhangye.
translations.idiomatic: The Shen Di Qiang invaded Zhangye.

sentences.zh: 六月，沈氐種羌叛，寇張掖，護羌校尉馬賢討沈氐羌，破之。

translations.literal: Sixth month: Shen Di tribe Qiang rebelled, invaded Zhangye, Protector Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked Shen Di Qiang, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, the Shen Di tribe of Qiang rebelled and invaded Zhangye; Protector Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked the Shen Di Qiang and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 秋七月乙酉朔，日有食之。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Yiyou first day: There was an eclipse of the sun.
translations.idiomatic: On the first day of the seventh month of autumn (Yiyou), there was a solar eclipse.

sentences.zh: 冬十月己巳，司空李郃免。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Jisi day: Minister of Works Li He dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day of the tenth month of winter, Minister of Works Li He was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 癸酉，衛尉廬江陳褒為司空。

translations.literal: Guiyou day: Guards Colonel Lujiang Chen Bao became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guiyou day, Chen Bao of Lujiang, Guards Colonel, became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 自三月至是月，京師及郡國三十三大風，雨水。

translations.literal: From third month to this month, capital and commanderies kingdoms thirty-three great winds, flooding.
translations.idiomatic: From the third month to this month, there were thirty-three great winds and flooding in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 十二月，永昌徼外撣國譴使貢獻。

translations.literal: Twelfth month: Yongchang frontier Shan kingdom sent envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, the Shan kingdom beyond the Yongchang frontiers sent envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 戊辰，司徒劉愷罷。

translations.literal: Wuchen day: Minister of the Masses Liu Kai dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuchen day, Minister of the Masses Liu Kai was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 遼西鮮卑降。

translations.literal: Liaoxi Xianbei surrendered.
translations.idiomatic: The Liaoxi Xianbei surrendered.

sentences.zh: 癸酉，太常楊震為司徒。

translations.literal: Guiyou day: Grand Minister of Ceremonies Yang Zhen became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guiyou day, Yang Zhen, Grand Minister of Ceremonies, became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 是歲，郡國二十三地震。

translations.literal: This year, commanderies and kingdoms twenty-three earthquakes.
translations.idiomatic: This year, there were twenty-three earthquakes in the commanderies and kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 夫餘王遣子詣闕貢獻。

translations.literal: Fuyu king sent son to the palace to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: The Fuyu king sent his son to the palace to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 燒當羌叛。

translations.literal: Shaodang Qiang rebelled.
translations.idiomatic: The Shaodang Qiang rebelled.

sentences.zh: 建光元年春正月，幽州刺史馮煥率二郡太守討高句驪、穢貊，不克。

translations.literal: Jianguang first year, spring, first month: Youzhou Governor Feng Huan led two commandery governors to attack Goguryeo, Huimo, unsuccessful.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month of spring of the first year of Jianguang, Youzhou Governor Feng Huan led two commandery governors to attack Goguryeo and Huimo, but was unsuccessful.

sentences.zh: 二月癸亥，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Second month, Guihai day: Great amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guihai day of the second month, a general amnesty was granted throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 賜諸園貴人、王、主、公、卿以下錢、布各有差。

translations.literal: Granted the various garden noble ladies, kings, princesses, dukes, ministers and below money, cloth each graded.
translations.idiomatic: Granted money and cloth in graded amounts to the various garden noble ladies, kings, princesses, dukes, ministers and below.

sentences.zh: 以公、卿、校尉、尚書子弟一人為郎、舍人。

translations.literal: With dukes, ministers, colonels, Masters of Writing sons one person each as attendants, gentlemen-in-waiting.
translations.idiomatic: Appointed one son each of the dukes, ministers, colonels, and Masters of Writing as attendants and gentlemen-in-waiting.

sentences.zh: 夏四月，穢貊復與鮮卑寇遼東，遼東太守蔡諷追擊，戰歿。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month: Huimo again with Xianbei invaded Liaodong, Liaodong Governor Cai Feng pursued and attacked, died in battle.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer, the Huimo again invaded Liaodong together with the Xianbei; Liaodong Governor Cai Feng pursued and attacked them, dying in battle.

sentences.zh: 丙辰，以廣川幷清河國。

translations.literal: Bingchen day: With Guangchuan merged Qinghe kingdom.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day, the Guangchuan kingdom was merged with Qinghe.

sentences.zh: 丁巳，尊孝德皇元妃耿氏為甘陵大貴人。

translations.literal: Dingsi day: Honored XiaoDe Emperor's primary consort Geng clan as Ganling Grand Noble Lady.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingsi day, the XiaoDe Emperor's primary consort of the Geng clan was honored as Grand Noble Lady of Ganling.

sentences.zh: 甲子，樂成王萇有罪，廢為臨湖侯。

translations.literal: Jiazi day: Lecheng King Chang had crimes, deposed to Linhu Marquis.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiazi day, King Chang of Lecheng, having crimes, was deposed to become Marquis of Linhu.

sentences.zh: 己巳，令公、卿、特進、侯、中二千石、二千石、郡國守相，舉有道之士各一人。

translations.literal: Jisi day: Ordered dukes, ministers, special advancers, marquises, middle two thousand shi, two thousand shi, commandery kingdom governors chancellors, recommend possessing the way scholars each one person.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day, dukes, ministers, special advancers, marquises, middle two thousand shi officials, two thousand shi officials, and commandery/kingdom governors and chancellors were ordered to each recommend one scholar possessing the way.

sentences.zh: 賜鰥、寡、孤、獨、貧不能自存者穀，人三斛。

translations.literal: Granted widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, poor unable to support themselves grain, each person three dou.
translations.idiomatic: Grain was granted to widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, and the poor unable to support themselves—three dou each.

sentences.zh: 甲戌，遼東屬國都尉龐奮，承偽璽書殺玄菟太守姚光。

translations.literal: Jiaxu day: Liaodong Dependent State Colonel Pang Fen, receiving false seal letter killed Xuanyu Governor Yao Guang.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiaxu day, Pang Fen, Colonel of Liaodong Dependent State, receiving a false seal letter, killed Governor Yao Guang of Xuanyu.

sentences.zh: 五月庚辰，特進鄧騭及度遼將軍鄧遵，並以譖自殺。

translations.literal: Fifth month, Gengchen day: Special Advancer Deng Zhi and Liao-crossing General Deng Zun, both through slander committed suicide.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengchen day of the fifth month, Special Advancer Deng Zhi and Liao-crossing General Deng Zun both committed suicide due to slander.

sentences.zh: 丙申，貶平原王翼為都鄉侯。

translations.literal: Bingshen day: Demoted Pingyuan King Yi to Duxiang Marquis.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingshen day, King Yi of Pingyuan was demoted to become Marquis of Duxiang.

sentences.zh: 秋七月己卯，改元建光，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Jimao day: Changed era name to Jianguang, great amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jimao day of the seventh month of autumn, the era name was changed to Jianguang, and a general amnesty was granted throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 壬寅，太尉馬英薨。

translations.literal: RenYin day: Grand Marshal Ma Ying passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the RenYin day, Grand Marshal Ma Ying passed away.

sentences.zh: 八月，護羌校尉馬賢討燒當羌於金城，不利。

translations.literal: Eighth month: Protector Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked Shaodang Qiang at Jincheng, unfavorable.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, Protector Qiang Colonel Ma Xian attacked the Shaodang Qiang at Jincheng, but met with unfavorable results.

sentences.zh: 甲子，前司徒劉愷為太尉。

translations.literal: Jiazi day: Former Minister of the Masses Liu Kai became Grand Marshal.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiazi day, former Minister of the Masses Liu Kai became Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑寇居庸關，九月，雲中太守成嚴擊之，戰歿。

translations.literal: Xianbei invaded Juyong Pass, ninth month, Yunzhong Governor Cheng Yan attacked them, died in battle.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei invaded Juyong Pass; in the ninth month, Yunzhong Governor Cheng Yan attacked them and died in battle.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑圍烏桓校尉於馬城，度遼將軍耿夔救之。

translations.literal: Xianbei surrounded Wuhuan Colonel at Macheng, Liao-crossing General Geng Kui rescued him.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei surrounded the Wuhuan Colonel at Macheng; Liao-crossing General Geng Kui rescued him.

sentences.zh: 戊子，幸衛尉馮石府。

translations.literal: Wuzi day: Visited Guards Colonel Feng Shi's residence.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuzi day, he visited the residence of Guards Colonel Feng Shi.

sentences.zh: 是秋，京師及郡國二十九雨水。

translations.literal: This autumn, capital and commanderies kingdoms twenty-nine flooding.
translations.idiomatic: This autumn, there were twenty-nine instances of flooding in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 冬十一月己丑，郡國三十五地震，或坼裂。

translations.literal: Winter, eleventh month, Jichou day: commanderies kingdoms thirty-five earthquakes, some with fissures.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jichou day of the eleventh month of winter, there were thirty-five earthquakes in the commanderies and kingdoms, some with ground fissures.

sentences.zh: 詔三公以下，各上封事陳得失。

translations.literal: Decreed Three Dukes and below, each present sealed memorials discussing gains and losses.
translations.idiomatic: The Three Dukes and below were decreed to each present sealed memorials discussing what was gained and lost.

sentences.zh: 遣光祿大夫案行，賜死者錢，人二千。

translations.literal: Dispatched Grand Provisioner to inspect and travel, granted money to the deceased, each person two thousand.
translations.idiomatic: A Grand Provisioner was dispatched to inspect and travel; money was granted to the deceased families, two thousand cash per person.

sentences.zh: 除今年田租。

translations.literal: Exempted this year's field rents.
translations.idiomatic: This year's field rents were exempted.

sentences.zh: 其被灾甚者，勿收口賦。

translations.literal: Those severely affected by disaster, do not collect head taxes.
translations.idiomatic: For those severely affected by disaster, head taxes were not collected.

sentences.zh: 鮮卑寇玄菟。

translations.literal: Xianbei invaded Xuanyu.
translations.idiomatic: The Xianbei invaded Xuanyu.

sentences.zh: 庚子，復斷大臣二千石以上服三年喪。

translations.literal: Gengzi day: Again prohibited ministers two thousand shi and above from observing three years mourning.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengzi day, ministers of two thousand shi rank and above were again prohibited from observing three years of mourning.

sentences.zh: 癸卯，詔三公、特進、侯、卿、校尉，舉武猛堪將帥者各五人。

translations.literal: Guimao day: Decreed Three Dukes, special advancers, marquises, ministers, colonels, recommend martial and fierce ones capable of being generals each five persons.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guimao day, the Three Dukes, special advancers, marquises, ministers, and colonels were decreed to each recommend five persons who were martial and fierce enough to serve as generals.

sentences.zh: 丙午，詔京師及郡國被水雨傷稼者，隨頃畝減田租。

translations.literal: Bingwu day: Decreed capital and commanderies kingdoms damaged by flooding injuring crops, reduce field rents according to mu.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day, it was decreed that field rents be reduced according to the number of mu damaged by flooding in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 甲子，初置漁陽營兵。

translations.literal: Jiazi day: First established Yuyang garrison troops.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jiazi day, garrison troops were first established in Yuyang.

sentences.zh: 冬十二月，高句驪、馬韓、穢貊圍玄菟城，夫餘王遣子與州、郡並力討破之。

translations.literal: Winter, twelfth month: Goguryeo, Mahan, Huimo surrounded Xuanyu city, Fuyu king sent son with province, commandery combined forces attacked and defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month of winter, Goguryeo, Mahan, and Huimo surrounded Xuanyu city; the Fuyu king sent his son who, together with provincial and commandery forces, attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 延光元年春二月，夫餘王遣子將兵救玄菟，擊高句驪、馬韓、穢貊，破之，遂遣使貢獻。

translations.literal: Yanguang first year, spring, second month: Fuyu king sent son leading troops to rescue Xuanyu, attacked Goguryeo, Mahan, Huimo, defeated them, then sent envoys to present tribute.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month of spring of the first year of Yanguang, the Fuyu king sent his son leading troops to rescue Xuanyu; they attacked Goguryeo, Mahan, and Huimo, defeated them, and then sent envoys to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 三月丙午，改元延光。

translations.literal: Third month, Bingwu day: Changed era name to Yanguang.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day of the third month, the era name was changed to Yanguang.

sentences.zh: 大赦天下。

translations.literal: Great amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: A general amnesty was granted throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 還徙者，復戶邑屬籍。

translations.literal: Those who returned and relocated, restored household settlements to the registers.
translations.idiomatic: Those who returned and relocated had their household settlements restored to the registers.

sentences.zh: 賜民爵及三老、孝悌、力田，人二級；

translations.literal: Granted nobility ranks to the people and three elders, filial and respectful, diligent farmers, each person two ranks;
translations.idiomatic: Nobility ranks were granted to the people and the three elders, those who were filial and respectful, and diligent farmers—two ranks each;

sentences.zh: 加賜鰥、寡、孤、獨、篤癃、貧不能自存者粟，人三斛；

translations.literal: Additionally granted grain to widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, seriously ill and disabled, poor unable to support themselves, each person three dou;
translations.idiomatic: Additionally, grain was granted to widowers, widows, orphans, solitaries, the seriously ill and disabled, and the poor unable to support themselves—three dou each;

sentences.zh: 貞婦帛，人二匹。

translations.literal: Chaste women silk, each person two bolts.
translations.idiomatic: Chaste women received silk—two bolts each.

sentences.zh: 夏四月癸未，京師郡國二十一雨雹。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Guiwei day: capital commanderies kingdoms twenty-one hailstorms.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guiwei day of the fourth month of summer, there were twenty-one hailstorms in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 癸巳，司空陳褒免。

translations.literal: Guisi day: Minister of Works Chen Bao dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guisi day, Minister of Works Chen Bao was dismissed.

sentences.zh: 五月庚戌，宗正彭城劉授為司空。

translations.literal: Fifth month, Gengxu day: Director of the Imperial Clan Pengcheng Liu Shou became Minister of Works.
translations.idiomatic: On the Gengxu day of the fifth month, Liu Shou of Pengcheng, Director of the Imperial Clan, became Minister of Works.

sentences.zh: 己巳，改樂成國為安平，封河間王開子得為安平王。

translations.literal: Jisi day: Changed Lecheng kingdom to Anping, enfeoffed Hejian King Kai's son De as Anping King.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day, the Lecheng kingdom was changed to Anping, and King Kai of Hejian's son De was enfeoffed as Anping King.

sentences.zh: 六月，郡國蝗。

translations.literal: Sixth month: commanderies kingdoms locusts.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, there were locusts in the commanderies and kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 秋七月癸卯，京師及郡國十三地震。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Guimao day: capital and commanderies kingdoms thirteen earthquakes.
translations.idiomatic: On the Guimao day of the seventh month of autumn, there were thirteen earthquakes in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms.

sentences.zh: 高句驪降。

translations.literal: Goguryeo surrendered.
translations.idiomatic: Goguryeo surrendered.

sentences.zh: 虔人羌叛，攻穀羅城，度遼將軍耿夔討破之。

translations.literal: Qianren Qiang rebelled, attacked Gualuo city, Liao-crossing General Geng Kui attacked and defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: The Qianren Qiang rebelled and attacked Gualuo city; Liao-crossing General Geng Kui attacked and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 八月戊子，陽陵園寢火。

translations.literal: Eighth month, Wuzi day: Yangling garden resting hall fire.
translations.idiomatic: On the Wuzi day of the eighth month, the resting hall in the Yangling garden burned.

sentences.zh: 辛卯，九真言黃龍見無功。

translations.literal: Xinmao day: Jiuzhen reported yellow dragon appeared Wugong.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinmao day, Jiuzhen reported that a yellow dragon had appeared in Wugong.

sentences.zh: 己亥，詔三公、中二千石，舉刺史、二千石、令、長、相，視事一歲以上至十歲，清白愛利、能勑身率下、防姦理煩、有益於人者，無拘官簿。

translations.literal: Jihai day: Decreed Three Dukes, middle two thousand shi, recommend inspectors, two thousand shi, magistrates, chancellors, administrators, serving one year above to ten years, pure white loving benefit, able to admonish self lead subordinates, prevent villainy handle troubles, beneficial to people, not constrained by official records.

translations.literal: Inspectors recommend their jurisdictions, commandery kingdom governors chancellors recommend black cords, hidden kin with whole heart, do not take superficial splendor.

translations.literal: Ninth month, Jiaxu day: commanderies kingdoms twenty-seven earthquakes.

translations.literal: Those whose dwellings destroyed, lost grain food, grain, each person three dou;

translations.literal: Moreover fields flooded damaged, all do not collect field rents;
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, for fields that were flooded and damaged, all field rents were exempted;

sentences.zh: 若一家皆被灾害而弱小存者，郡、縣為收斂之。

translations.literal: If entire family suffered disaster and only young and weak survive, commandery, county collect for them.
translations.idiomatic: If an entire family suffered disaster and only the young and weak survived, the commandery and county would collect aid for them.

translations.idiomatic: The Qianren Qiang rebelled and attacked Gualuo city; Liao-crossing General Geng Kui attacked and defeated them.

translations.idiomatic: By imperial decree, gentlemen from the Three Offices and officials able to understand the Ancient Text Documents, Mao Poetry, and Guliang Spring and Autumn Annals were selected—one each.

translations.literal: Bingchen day: Hedong, Yingchuan great winds.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingchen day, there were great winds in Hedong and Yingchuan.

translations.literal: Summer, sixth month, Renwu day: commanderies kingdoms eleven great winds.

translations.literal: Phoenix passed through pavilion departments, do not pay this year field rents.
translations.idiomatic: The pavilion departments through which the phoenix passed were exempted from this year's field rents.

sentences.zh: 賜男子爵，人二級。

translations.literal: Granted males nobility ranks, each person two ranks.
translations.idiomatic: Males were granted nobility ranks—two ranks each.

sentences.zh: 辛卯，幸太山，柴告岱宗。

translations.literal: Xinmao day: Visited Taishan, burned offerings and informed Mount Dai.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinmao day, he visited Mount Tai and made burnt offerings to inform Mount Dai.

sentences.zh: 齊王無忌、北海王翼、樂安王延來朝。

translations.literal: Qi King Wuji, Beihai King Yi, Le'an King Yan came to court.
translations.idiomatic: King Wuji of Qi, King Yi of Beihai, and King Yan of Le'an came to court.

sentences.zh: 壬辰，宗祀五帝於汶上明堂。

translations.literal: Renchen day: Ancestral sacrifice to Five Emperors at Wen river Bright Hall.
translations.idiomatic: On the Renchen day, ancestral sacrifices were offered to the Five Emperors at the Bright Hall on the Wen river.

translations.idiomatic: On the Guisi day, sacrifices were made to the two ancestors and six ancestors, rewards were given to the commanderies and counties, and music was performed.

sentences.zh: 夏四月乙丑，車駕入宮，假於祖禰。

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Yichou day: Imperial carriages entered palace, rested at ancestral temples.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yichou day of the fourth month of summer, the imperial carriages entered the palace and rested at the ancestral temples.

translations.idiomatic: On the Wuchen day, Grand Provisioner Feng Shi became Grand Marshal.

translations.literal: Rinan frontier barbarian Yi became internal subjects.
translations.idiomatic: The barbarian Yi beyond the Rinan frontiers became internal subjects.

translations.idiomatic: On the Gengwu day, Langzhong mountain collapsed.

translations.literal: Xinwei day: Fufeng reported white deer appeared Yong.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinwei day, Fufeng reported that a white deer had appeared in Yong.

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month, Dingyou day: First restored Right School, Left School magistrate assistant officials.
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingyou day of the seventh month of autumn, the magistrates and assistants of the Right School and Left School were first restored.

translations.literal: Rinan frontier barbarian leaders went to palace presented tribute.

translations.literal: Eighth month, Xinsi day: Grand Herald Geng Bao became Grand General.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinsi day of the eighth month, Grand Herald Geng Bao became Grand General.

sentences.zh: 戊子，潁川上言麒麟一、白虎二見陽翟。

translations.literal: Wuzi day: Yingchuan reported one qilin, two white tigers appeared Yangdi.

translations.idiomatic: This year, there were twenty-three earthquakes in the capital and commanderies/kingdoms;

translations.literal: Thirty-six flooding, violent winds, hailstorms.
translations.idiomatic: There were thirty-six instances of flooding, violent winds, and hailstorms.

translations.idiomatic: On the Dingmao day, he visited Ye; the Emperor passed away in his carriage, aged thirty-two.

sentences.zh: 夏四月丁酉，太尉馮石為太傅，司徒劉熹為太尉，參錄尚書事；

translations.literal: Summer, fourth month, Dingyou day: Grand Marshal Feng Shi became Grand Tutor, Minister of the Masses Liu Xi became Grand Marshal, participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs;
translations.idiomatic: On the Dingyou day of the fourth month of summer, Grand Marshal Feng Shi became Grand Tutor, Minister of the Masses Liu Xi became Grand Marshal, and participated in recording Masters of Writing affairs;

sentences.zh: 前司空李郃為司徒。

translations.literal: Former Minister of Works Li He became Minister of the Masses.
translations.idiomatic: Former Minister of Works Li He became Minister of the Masses.

sentences.zh: 辛卯，大將軍耿寶、中常侍樊豐、侍中謝惲、周廣、乳母野王君王聖，坐相阿黨，豐、惲、廣下獄死，寶自殺，聖徙鴈門。

translations.literal: Xinmao day: Grand General Geng Bao, Palace Attendant Fan Feng, Palace Attendant Xie Yun, Zhou Guang, wet nurse Yewang Jun Wang Sheng, convicted of mutual partisanship, Feng, Yun, Guang imprisoned died, Bao committed suicide, Sheng banished to Yanmen.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinmao day, Grand General Geng Bao, Palace Attendant Fan Feng, Palace Attendants Xie Yun and Zhou Guang, and wet nurse Wang Sheng of Yewang Jun, convicted of mutual partisanship, were imprisoned and died; Bao committed suicide; Sheng was banished to Yanmen.

sentences.zh: 己酉，葬孝安皇帝於恭陵。

translations.literal: Jisi day: Buried Emperor Xiao An at Gongling.
translations.idiomatic: On the Jisi day, Emperor Xiao An was buried at Gongling.

sentences.zh: 廟曰恭宗。

translations.literal: Temple called Gongzong.
translations.idiomatic: His temple was called Gongzong.

sentences.zh: 六月乙巳，大赦天下。

translations.literal: Sixth month, Yisi day: Great amnesty throughout the realm.
translations.idiomatic: On the Yisi day of the sixth month, a general amnesty was granted throughout the empire.

sentences.zh: 詔先帝巡狩所幸，皆半入今年田租。

translations.literal: Decreed places visited by the late emperor on inspection tours, all pay half this year's field rents.
translations.idiomatic: By imperial decree, all places visited by the late emperor on his inspection tours were to pay half of this year's field rents.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，西域長史班勇擊車師後王，斬之。

translations.literal: Autumn, seventh month: Western Regions Chief Ban Yong attacked Cheshi Rear King, beheaded him.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, Western Regions Chief Ban Yong attacked the Cheshi Rear King and beheaded him.

sentences.zh: 丙午，東海王肅薨。

translations.literal: Bingwu day: Donghai King Su passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day, King Su of Donghai passed away.

sentences.zh: 冬十月丙午，越巂山崩。

translations.literal: Winter, tenth month, Bingwu day: YueXi mountain collapsed.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bingwu day of the tenth month of winter, YueXi mountain collapsed.

sentences.zh: 辛亥，少帝薨。

translations.literal: Xinhai day: Young Emperor passed away.
translations.idiomatic: On the Xinhai day, the Young Emperor passed away.

sentences.zh: 是冬，京師大疫。

translations.literal: This winter, capital great epidemic.
translations.idiomatic: This winter, there was a great epidemic in the capital.

sentences.zh: 論曰：孝安雖稱尊享御，而權歸鄧氏，至乃損徹膳服，克念政道。

translations.literal: Discussion says: Xiao An although called honored enjoyed rule, but authority returned to Deng clan, even to the point of reducing and removing food clothing, vigorously considering governance way.
translations.idiomatic: The Commentary says: Although Emperor Xiao An was called honored and enjoyed imperial rule, authority returned to the Deng clan; to the point where he even reduced and removed his food and clothing, vigorously considering the way of governance.

sentences.zh: 然令自房帷，威不逮遠，始失根統，歸成陵敝。

translations.literal: Yet commands from bed curtains, authority did not reach far, beginning to lose root unity, returned to become tomb decline.
translations.idiomatic: Yet commands came from the bed curtains; authority did not reach far; he began to lose the root unity and returned to become a tomb's decline.

sentences.zh: 遂復計金授官，移民逃寇，推咎臺衡，以答天眚。

translations.literal: Thereupon again counted gold granted offices, moved people fled bandits, shifted blame to court balance, to answer heavenly calamities.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon he again counted gold to grant offices, moved people to flee bandits, shifted blame to the court balance, to answer heavenly calamities.

sentences.zh: 既雲哲婦，亦『惟家之索』矣。

translations.literal: Already called wise woman, also 'only house's cord' indeed.
translations.idiomatic: Already called a wise woman, it was also 'only the house's cord' indeed.

sentences.zh: 贊曰：安德不升，秕我王度。

translations.literal: Encomium says: An virtue not ascended, blighted my royal measure.
translations.idiomatic: The Encomium says: The virtue of An did not ascend; it blighted my royal measure.

sentences.zh: 降奪儲嫡，開萌邪蠹。

translations.literal: Descended seized heir legitimate, opened sprouts evil wood-borers.
translations.idiomatic: He descended and seized the legitimate heir, opening sprouts of evil wood-borers.

sentences.zh: 馮石承歡，楊公逢怒。

translations.literal: Feng Shi received favor, Yang Gong met anger.
translations.idiomatic: Feng Shi received favor; Yang Gong met anger.

sentences.zh: 彼日而微，遂祲天路。

translations.literal: That day and dim, then eclipsed heavenly road.
translations.idiomatic: That day and dim, then eclipsed the heavenly road.
